articles.title: Hawaii governor: An urgent call to action to protect America’s children from measles - CNN
articles.description: Dr. Josh Green says HHS “must mount an extensive, science-based vaccination campaign to halt the spread of measles and prevent future tragedies.”
articles.content: Editors note:Dr. Josh Green is the governor of Hawaii. Before being elected governor in 2022, he worked as an emergency room doctor and family physician in Hawaii for over 20 years. While serving as … [+7106 chars]

articles.title: North America is 'dripping' blobs of rock down into Earth's mantle under the U.S. - Earth.com
articles.description: Beneath the crust of North America, scientists have found that the deep roots of the continent are slowly dripping away in blobs of rock.
articles.content:
Beneath the stable crust of North America, scientists have discovered something extraordinary: the deep roots of the continent are slowly dripping away in blobs of rock.
